resume.skillmessage: Front End Developer with over 2.5 years of technical expertise in Web Development. Good experience in working with JavaScript, jQuery and ReactJS. Implemented UX mock-ups/designs to functional and complete application. Proven track record demonstrating innovative and unique developing skills, ability to work in astressful environment with projects and interaction with every team member. Excellent working knowledge and thorough exposure on compatibility issues with different ver-sions of browsers like Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Safari and Google Chrome.
